post.desc:
Bruh didn't put the tonal marks in the katakana, so I got really confused on – say – "Misuhaku" (which I made my educated guess from the shape of the item to be "**Mizubaku**" or "Mizu Bakudan"). And I assume "**Sub**" meant sub-equipment.

Oh, and what Takane's saying in the dialogue is literally just "Test". I mean, this is a draft for [a game being made](https://x.com/yado_2b/status/1840791658520351155). Anyway, I figured it should be harmless for me to play with an effectively empty speech bubble.
